import React,{useState}from'react';import"./login.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{// Make a POST request to login API endpoint

setError('Invalid username or password');return;}// Login successful, redirect to admin panel
